metadata.title: CVE-2024-27075 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:dvb-frontends: avoid stack overflow warnings with clang A previous patchworked around a KASAN issue in stv0367, now a similar problem showed upwith clang: drivers/media/dvb-frontends/stv0367.c:1222:12: error: stackframe size (3624) exceeds limit (2048) in 'stv0367ter_set_frontend'[-Werror,-Wframe-larger-than] 1214 | static intstv0367ter_set_frontend(struct dvb_frontend *fe) Rework thestv0367_writereg() function to be simpler and mark both register accessfunctions as noinline_for_stack so the temporary i2c_msg structures do notget duplicated on the stack when KASAN_STACK is enabled.
